original_text: As they were emptying their sacks, there in each man’s sack was his pouch of silver! When they and their father saw the money pouches, they were frightened.
korean_text: 각기 자루를 쏟고 본즉 각 사람의 돈뭉치가 그 자루 속에 있는지라 그들과 그들의 아버지가 돈뭉치를 보고 다 두려워하더니

sentences.original_text: As they were emptying their sacks
there in each man's sack was his pouch of silver
sentences.korean_translation: 각 사람의 자루 속에 그의 은 주머니가 있었다

sentences.original_text: When they and their father saw the money pouches
sentences.korean_translation: 그들과 그들의 아버지가 돈 주머니들을 보았을 때
